name: Shoot Out of the Raymen
description: Player 1 Controls (Keyboard): A, S, D, W, to move - Q, E, to aim gun. Player 2 Controls (Keyboard): Num4, Num5, Num6, Num8, to move - Num7, Num9, to aim gun. Player 1 Controls (GamePad): Gamepad 0 Left analog X axis > 5, Gamepad 0 Left analog X axis < -5, Gamepad 0 Left analog Y axis > 5, Gamepad 0 Left analog Y axis < -5 Player 2 Controls (GamePad): Gamepad 1 Left analog X axis > 5, Gamepad 1 Left analog X axis < -5, Gamepad 1 Left analog Y axis > 5, Gamepad 1 Left analog Y axis < -5
